title: Tranquil China Escape on the Edge of Cangshan Mountain & Peaceful Lake
description: Escape to the peaceful and laidback city of Dali, known for its eye-catching natural wonders, with a stay at Hotel Indigo Dali Erhai, an IHG Hotel. Nestled between the beautiful Cangshan mountain ranges and picturesque Erhai Lake, this boutique bolthole is perfectly placed to stroll through ancient villages and remarkable natural landscapes. Dali is known for its sunshine and romantic scenery, so hop on a bike to breathe in the fresh air while exploring everything this petite city has to offer.
location_description: Hotel Indigo Dali Erhai, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No.15 Binhai Avenue, Dali, YN 671000, Mainland China
